paper_abstract: Compared with the wide research on reversible watermarking scheme for raster image, the research on its counterpart for 2-D CAD engineering graphics lags far behind. In this paper, based on improved quantization index modulation (IQIM) and improved difference expansion (IDE), a combined reversible watermarking scheme is proposed for 2-D CAD engineering graphics. The proposed scheme can solve the embedding-limitation problem existing in IQIM technique and increase the watermark embedding capacity greatly. Theoretical analysis and experimental results also show that the proposed scheme has good imperceptibility and robustness.
paper_title: A high capacity combined reversible watermarking scheme for 2-D CAD engineering graphics
